title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the label's font size is modified, the label height does not update immediately.
OB: Observed Behavior: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the label font size in the UI.
EB: Expected Behavior: The label height should update dynamically to fit the new font size after modifying it in the UI.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label
2. Edit the label's font size to "18 points" in the UI
3. Observe that the label height does not change accordingly.
